message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a value for $120. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $110. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know and we'll proceed with the transaction.
